abstract.p: Zia Mahmood and Michael Rosenberg win Life Master Pairs at American Contract Bridge League's Summer Nationals (S)

block.p: One of the world's great bridge partnerships captured yet another title at the American Contract Bridge League's Summer Nationals here on Sunday night. Zia Mahmood of Manhattan, a charismatic star originally from Pakistan, won the Life Master Pairs with Michael Rosenberg of Wykagyl, N.Y., a Scotsman reputed to be the best technician in the game.
They have won many team titles together, but had never before won a major pair championship.

One of the world's great bridge partnerships captured yet another title at the American Contract Bridge League's Summer Nationals here on Sunday night. Zia Mahmood of Manhattan, a charismatic star originally from Pakistan, won the Life Master Pairs with Michael Rosenberg of Wykagyl, N.Y., a Scotsman reputed to be the best technician in the game.
They have won many team titles together, but had never before won a major pair championship.
Their margin of victories was more than two boards. These were the standings after three days of play:
1. Zia and Rosenberg 1726.93
2. The defending champions, John Mohan of Christiansted, V.I., and Sam Lev of Forest Hills, Queens, 1624.94
3. Eric Greco of Philadelphia and Mike Passell of Plano, Tex., 1615.69.
The prestigious Spingold Knockout Team Championship began this afternoon. These were the top seeds, by captain:
1. Nick Nickell of Manhattan
2. Rita Shugart of Pebble Beach, Calif.
3. James Cayne of Manhattan
4. Grant Baze of La Jolla, Calif.
5. George Jacobs of Hinsdale, Ill.
6. Steve Robinson of Arlington, Va.
7. Rose Johnson Meltzer of Los Gatos, Calif.
8. Richard Schwartz of East Elmhurst, Queens
These were the top seeds by captain in the Women's Knockout Teams:
1. Connie Goldberg of Merion Station, Pa.
2. Kathie Wei-Sender of Nashville
3. Cheri Bjerkan of Elmhurst, Ill.
4. Joan Jackson of Dallas
5. Hjordis Eythorsdottir of Huntsville, Ala.
6. Lynn Baker of Austin, Tex.
7. Rhoda Walsh of Henderson, Nev.
8. Suzy Burger of West Bloomfield, Mich.
